characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclists
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. At the beginning, the road is clear with some vehicles ahead. As the vehicle progresses, a white sedan from the left side lane cuts into the self-vehicles lane. Further ahead, multiple motorcyclists are seen crossing the road from the right side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed initially. Upon noticing the white sedan cutting in from the left side lane, the vehicle decelerates to avoid a collision. The vehicle continues to decelerate as it approaches the motorcyclists crossing the road from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, cutting into the self-vehicles lane. 2) Right side: Multiple motorcyclists, approximately 15 meters away, crossing the road.
